content.title: Alpasankhyak Post-Maitrik Chhaatravrtti Yojana
content.details: The Alpasankhyak Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme under the Higher Education Department of the Madhya Pradesh government provides financial assistance to students from minority communities in Madhya Pradesh pursuing post-secondary education. This scheme aims to alleviate the financial burden on economically disadvantaged minority students, enabling them to access quality education and pursue higher studies. By offering scholarships for tuition fees, maintenance allowances, and other educational expenses, it seeks to promote inclusive growth and empower minority communities through education.
benefits: Tuition fee of ₹3,000/- per year for graduate and postgraduate students.
Maintenance allowance of ₹570/- per month for undergraduate and postgraduate hostel students.
Maintenance allowance of ₹300/- per month for non-hostel students.
Maintenance allowance of ₹1,200/- per month for M.Phil. and Ph.D. hostel students.
Maintenance allowance of ₹550/- per month for M.Phil. and Ph.D. non-hostel students.
Maintenance allowance will be payable for 10 months.
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of the minority category of Madhya Pradesh.
The total annual income of the applicant's parents and guardian should not exceed ₹2,00,000/-.
Not less than 50 percent marks in the last qualifying examination.

faqs.question: What is the Alpasankhyak Post-Maitrik Chhaatravrtti Yojana?
faqs.answer: It is a scholarship scheme for minority students pursuing post-secondary education.

faqs.question: What is the purpose of this scheme?
faqs.answer: Its purpose is to provide financial assistance to minority students to pursue higher education.

faqs.question: What types of financial support does the scheme offer?
faqs.answer: It offers maintenance allowances and other educational expenses coverage.

faqs.question: How much is the maintenance allowance for undergraduate and postgraduate hostel students?
faqs.answer: It is ₹570 per month for undergraduate and postgraduate hostel students.

faqs.question: How much is the maintenance allowance for non-hostel undergraduate and postgraduate students?
faqs.answer: It is ₹300 per month for non-hostel undergraduate and postgraduate students.

faqs.question: What is the maintenance allowance for M.Phil. and Ph.D. hostel students?
faqs.answer: It is ₹1,200 per month for M.Phil. and Ph.D. hostel students.

faqs.question: How much is the maintenance allowance for M.Phil. and Ph.D. non-hostel students?
faqs.answer: It is ₹550 per month for M.Phil. and Ph.D. non-hostel students.

faqs.question: Is there any additional financial assistance provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Apart from maintenance allowances, the scheme may cover tuition fees and other incidental expenses.

faqs.question: What documents are required during the application process?
faqs.answer: Aadhar card, Bank account statement, Mark sheet, Address proof, Proof of income, Passport-size photograph, Mobile number.

faqs.question: Can I apply offline?
faqs.answer: According to the guidelines, the form can be filled out only online.
